questions.question: A team is training a neural network model in Amazon SageMaker. During training, they notice that the model's performance has plateaued, and suspect a vanishing gradient issue. How can they leverage SageMaker Debugger to diagnose and address this problem?
options: Set up custom debug rules to capture disappearing gradients and adjust the learning rate as needed.
Enable SageMaker Clarify to detect vanishing gradients during training.
Use cross-validation to rotate training data, preventing gradient loss.
Increase the training epochs until SageMaker Debugger resolves the issue.
correct_answers: Set up custom debug rules to capture disappearing gradients and adjust the learning rate as needed.
